meaning_str.bing:
n. 刷；画笔；刷子；毛刷
v. 掸；刷亮；（用刷子）抹；轻擦
网络. 电刷；笔刷；画刷

刷；刷子；毛刷；画笔；轻触；电刷；灌木丛；小树丛；下层植被；短暂的接触；争执；小冲突；掠过；狐狸尾巴
（用刷子）刷净；轻拂；刷（涂料、油漆等）；打扫（尘土）；梳理（头发）；清洁（牙齿）；（在某物上）迅速地移动；（与某人）擦肩而过

1.en: Use a Brush Tool to add a bit of a highlight on the bevel. Use the Blur Tool to soften the highlight.
1.cn: 用画笔工具在斜面上添加一小块高光。使用模糊工具来软化亮点。

2.en: When the brush color, nail oil brush should be to leave a little soft skin parts, note color should not be stained to soft on the skin.
2.cn: 在刷颜色时，指甲油刷应稍微离开软皮部位，注意不要将颜色沾到软皮上。

3.en: He thought for a moment and decided it was unnecessary to whitewash the other caves, and then he laid down his brush magnanimously .
3.cn: 他算来算去，觉得暂时没有必要把更多的洞窟刷白，就刷这几个吧，他达观地放下了刷把。

0.en: And I first just apply it, just all across my face and then I'll use this Sigma FLAT KABUKI stippling brush. I think it's stippling brush.
0.cn: 首先开始涂抹，覆盖到整张脸，然后使用Sigma FLAT KABUKI点状刷子,我想是点状刷子。

2.en: Before going to bed, Peppa and George brush their teeth.
2.cn: 睡觉之前，佩奇和乔治要刷牙。

3.en: Before going to bed, Peppa and George brush their teeth.
3.cn: 在上床之前，佩佩和乔治刷牙。

4.en: Before going to bed, Peppa and George brush their teeth.
4.cn: 上床睡觉之前，佩琪和乔治在刷牙。

5.en: Before going to bed, Peppa and George brush their teeth.
5.cn: 睡觉之前，佩奇和乔治要刷牙。

6.en: What? Give me a brush. Give me the keys. No way. Well, no brush.
6.cn: 什么？把梳子给我。钥匙给我。不行。那我就不给你梳子。

7.en: Forgot to brush. Do you want this anemone to sting you? Yes. Brush.
7.cn: 你忘记擦防护油了。你想让这个海葵刺疼你吗? 好的。快擦。

8.en: You're gonna brush your teeth on my couch? No, I'm gonna brush Cinnamon's teeth.
8.cn: 你在沙发上刷牙？不是，我是要给肉桂刷牙。

9.en: And I'm gonna use smutch brush and just one that allow.
9.cn: 然后用一个去污毛刷，刷一下就可以。

10.en: Thanks for all the help. Don't forget to brush your teeth.
10.cn: 谢谢你们帮我。别忘了刷牙。

11.en: Two it is. Okay, time for bed, I'm gonna go brush my teeth.
11.cn: 那就两个吧，该上床了，我要去刷牙了。

12.en: And then after I've got all the details and I move in with my large powder brush.
12.cn: 细节都处理好后，我开始使用大号散粉刷。

13.en: Their mother smiled and said with a purr, Fine, but at least you should brush your fur.
13.cn: 妈咪笑了 喵喵说"好吧 至少把毛刷刷好

14.en: Right, so march in there, brush your teeth and go to bed. But I don't want to go to bed.
14.cn: 没错，所以进屋去，刷刷牙，上床睡觉。但我不想睡觉。

15.en: Every morning Peppa and George brush their teeth. Today Peppa and George are going to the dentist.
15.cn: 每天早上佩奇和乔治都会刷牙。今天牙医会检查他们的牙齿。

16.en: I use NYC SUNNY to add some goldenness to my skin. And I use a large angled contour brush to apply this.
16.cn: 我使用的是NYC丝滑阴影修容粉饼，来给肌肤增添金色。我使用大号斜角轮廓刷来涂抹。

17.en: Well, I guess we'll go back home and brush up on the anemone. You coming, Dory? Me? Oh I'm just going to the dropoff.
17.cn: 我看我们回家去，在海葵身上找吃的。你要来吗？多莉。我、我打算到悬崖那边去。

18.en: You used my toothbrush? Not the brush part just the little rubber thing to pick food from my teeth and massage my gums.
18.cn: 你用了我的牙刷？没用刷毛的部分，不过是用那橡皮垫剔了剔我的牙，顺便揉了揉牙床。

19.en: I'm using a fluffy brush from Elf and just use that to your seamlessly transition the shadows to the color of your flesh.
19.cn: 用Elf的毛刷，用它来无缝对接眼影和皮肤的颜色。
